original_text: And that which is left of the meat offering shall be Aaron's and his sons': it is a thing most holy of the offerings of the Lord made by fire.
korean_text: 소제물의 남은 것은 아론과 그의 아들들에게 돌릴지니 이는 여호와의 화제물 중에 지극히 거룩한 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And that which is left of the meat offering
shall be Aaron's and his sons'
it is a thing most holy
of the offerings of the Lord made by fire
sentences.korean_translation: 불로 드리는 여호와의 제물 중의 것이라
